text: @NYGovCuomo Too bad for the 6,000 elderly nursing home (NH) residents that died because of your 3/25 directive ordering positive coronavirus patients into NH. I’m sure they would have liked to be with their families but unfortunately they trusted you to protect them.  Big mistake!
